description:
Lisa Tiffian ain't afraid of no ghosts...in fact, they fucking turn her on! She lets this little secret slip while watching a scary movie with boyfriend Tommy Pistol, confessing she's always wanted to be fucked by a bunch of guys while wandering a haunted house...
Good boyfriend that he is, Tommy delivers. Lisa is at the spooky maze the following day with Lorelei Lee when suddenly, Lorelei disappears and Lisa is surprised by Tommy and five of his masked friends! They give her everything a typical whore in a slutty Halloween costume would want: rough sex, anal, cum guzzling, DV, DP and throat fucking.
title: Slutty Halloween Whore Gets A Frightful Fucking!
